statements: UPDATE TradeMatchingEngine SET buy_quantity = 100 WHERE trade_id = 1;

UPDATE sell_orders SET price = 800.50 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND quantity > 20;
UPDATE trades SET quantity = 100 WHERE trade_id = 1;
UPDATE sell_orders SET price = 50.75, quantity = 200 WHERE order_id = 3;
UPDATE trades SET quantity = quantity + 10, price = price * 1.05 WHERE trade_id = 1001;
UPDATE buy_orders SET quantity = quantity - 5, price = 25.75 WHERE order_id = 2002;
